commit.message:
Azure tests, docs, and fixes (#498)

* feat(reader): add __enter__ and __exit__ functions

* start updating README

* finish README and fix small typo in asb.py

* integration test wip

* fix broken string formatting

* rename bucket to container

* fix type

* allow root container

* integration tests passing

* clean up integration test with fixture

* make client required

* rename asb to azure

* fix another reference to asb

* rename more instances of asb -> azure

* consistent naming for azure

* fix mock constructor

* fix assert msg

* we weren't actually doing any buffer???

* enable min_part_size functionality and test buffering in unit tests

* buffering fixed

* fix flake8

* more specific flake8 ignore

* change block to originate from part_num instead of bytes_uploaded

* Fix __exit__

* remove terminate and yank out unused create in gcs test

* change __exit__ back to original

* short client test name and fix doc test

* Update CHANGELOG.md

Co-authored-by: Nicolas Mitchell <nclsmitchell@MacBook-Pro-de-Nicolas.local>
Co-authored-by: Michael Penkov <m@penkov.dev>
